cause.description:
L.I.P=Life Is a Party. I would like to help raise money for sick and under-privilaged children so that they can have the party of their dreams. Princess parties, Sweet 16s, ect.
1. Live your life!
2. Life is a party!
3. This is your party!
cause.mission: help under-privilaged children live their dreams
cause.name: L.I.P
